opinions.title: From Action are new
opinions.body: This is react 19 with form actions hooks like useActionState and useFormStatus (react-dom) to the new way to handle the submission on a form

opinions.title: Do yourself a favor and learn React!
opinions.body: React is a great library to learn, but it's not just about the basics. Dive deeper!\nFor example with this course!

opinions.title: Do yourself a favor and learn React!
opinions.body:
React is an amazing JavaScript library!

Despite all it's shortcomings.

opinions.title: React has more depth than you might first think!
opinions.body:
React is a great library to learn, but it's not just about the basics. Dive deeper!
For example with this course!
